name: otheraddon
description: Shortcuts to cut down on the number of clicks and typing you have to do to get the results you are looking for.
author: Aaron E-J

preferences.name: keyWikiPedia
preferences.title: Wikipedia Key Combination
preferences.description: The Key Combination that opens a Wikipedia page ('accel'='Ctrl')

preferences.name: keyWikTionary
preferences.title: Wiktionary Key Combination
preferences.description: The Key Combination that opens a Wiktionary page ('accel'='Ctrl')

preferences.name: keyHide
preferences.title: Hide Key Combination
preferences.description: The Key Combination that closes the Wiki popup ('accel'='Ctrl')
